title: Hulton Bridge closes until Oct. 20, when new span opens
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: North - Today 
The Hulton Bridge will be closed today through Oct. 19 so construction crews can realign parts of Hulton Road to the new $65.7 million brid...
